maker: Possibly modeled by Michel-Dorothée Coudray, Finished by the sculpture detailer Nantier, Sèvres Manufactory
title: Lidded Vase (vase à tête de bouc)
description: Lidded Vase (vase à tête de bouc); Possibly modeled by Michel-Dorothée Coudray (French, 1718 - 1775), Finished by the sculpture detailer Nantier (French, active 1767 - 1776), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Sèvres, France; about 1768; Soft paste porcelain, bleu nouveau ground color and gilding; 34.1 × 21.9 × 16.8 cm (13 7/16 × 8 5/8 × 6 5/8 in.); 82.DE.36.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
